channel.title: california on Tolar Town
channel.description: Recent content in california on Tolar Town

item.title: Wine tasting in Sonoma
item.description: Adam, Tara, & I drove from Vallejo up through the greater Sonoma region and Russian River Valley to visit a few wineries: Moshin, VJB, and Domaine Carneros. Later, Adam & I made a brief trip into San Francisco to attend a sound bath, complete with gongs and flutes. The wine was great, while the sound bath was a bit odd (and I probably wouldn’t return any time soon). But we at least got a solid hamburger in at a diner afterwards.

item.title: A lazy day in Vallejo
item.description: A lazy day in Vallejo, California, hanging out with Adam & Peter’s dogs & pig. Chich Uta Ita Backyard
